h1.span: WELCOME TO SHELL KNOB SCHOOL DISTRICT #78

p.span: Shell Knob School has high educational standards and expectations for each student. Students have established a tradition of excellent academic success and attendance, which goes hand-in-hand to produce the kind of caring, committed, contributing citizens for which Shell Knob is known. We believe that hard work, cooperation, and involvement of the staff, students, parents, and the community are the keys to each individual student's success.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: Shell Knob School District #78 educates, encourages, inspires, and prepares students for success in their future endeavors by providing a safe and engaging learning environment.

span.style: font-size: 12.8px; font-family: arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(56, 118, 29);

background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: Bullying and Cyberbullying (see Board policy JFCF)

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Intimidation, unwanted aggressive behavior, or harassment that is repetitive or is substantially likely to be repeated and causes a reasonable student to fear for his or her physical safety or property; that substantially interferes with the educational performance, opportunities or benefits of any student without exception; or that substantially disrupts the orderly operation of the school. Bullying includes, but is not limited to: physical actions, including violence, gestures, theft or property damage; oral, written or electronic communication, including name-calling, put-downs, extortion or threats; or threats of reprisal or retaliation for reporting such acts. Cyberbullying is a form of bullying committed by transmission of a communication including, but not limited to, a message, text, sound or image by means of an electronic device including, but not limited to, a telephone, wireless telephone or other wireless communication device, computer or pager. Click here for bullying incident report. Please print, fill out and return to Dr. Conyac.

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 51);
span.strong: The Board designates the following individual to act as the district's liaison for homeless students (homeless liaison):

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 51);

font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 51);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 51);

font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 51);

font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 51);

p.span:
The homeless liaison shall designate and train another district employee to serve as the homeless liaison in the absence of the homeless liaison.
Cheryl Kosmatka - Homeless State Coordinator 573-522-8763 or 573-751-3468 Cheryl.Kosmatka@dese.mo.gov
Parent information https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eVTIz1YzBaBF57R3Ke4UOpnmLprkyfHz/view?ts=5d27eb2d

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.strong: The district designates the following individual as the liaison for foster care students:

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: justify; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span:
The liaison will provide assistance regarding all aspects of the enrollment, placement, transfer and withdrawal of children in foster care and serve as the point of contact for DESE and the CD. The liaison will also work with DESE and the CD to implement the district's complaint resolution process.
Missouri Course Access Program Because virtual instruction can be an effective education option for some students, the district may offer virtual courses to students through district staff or by contracting for those services as part of the district-sponsored curriculum. In addition, eligible students may enroll in virtual courses offered through the Missouri Course Access Program (MOCAP/LAUNCH). The district will accept all grades and credits earned through district-sponsored virtual instruction (LAUNCH). For further information, see Board Policy IGCD

span.style: font-size: large; text-transform: uppercase; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(11, 59, 11);

p.span: CHECK OUR DISTRICT FACEBOOK PAGE BY FOLLOWING THE LINK:

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.strong: Any individual who observes, detects, or suspects improper use of taxpayer funds should report such improper use to the Office of Inspector General of the ED.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

a.style: color: rgb(17, 85, 204); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.strong: Throughout the school year, Shell Knob District #78 participates in the National Food Service Program. During the COVID 19 crisis, the district is participating in the Summer Food Service Program through the Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services. Shell Knob School District #78 is an equal opportunity provider.

strong.br: Click the link below for the latest update from Dr. Fransen
